name: OnEnterExitModShop
warnings: Known Bug(s): Players collide when they get into the same mod shop.
versions: This callback was added in SA-MP 0.3a and will not work in earlier versions!
description: This callback is called when a player enters or exits a mod shop.

params_body.name: playerid
params_body.description: The ID of the player that entered or exited the modshop

params_body.name: enterexit
params_body.description: 1 if the player entered or 0 if they exited

params_body.name: interiorid
params_body.description: The interior ID of the modshop that the player is entering (or 0 if exiting)

return_values: It is always called first in filterscripts.
